title: US lied about WMD in Iraq. If UN allows Syria to fall the UN must close shop
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Plenty of fabrications went into preparing the grounds to militarily invade Iraq. There were no WMDs, Saddam had no links to 9/11 or Al Qaeda and he may have been dubbed a “dictator” but he did not do any of the damage the US and Allies have done…
